narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Pre-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Pre-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant.  
 
This site is determined to be compliance with Animal Welfare Act. All sites used for regulated activity must demonstrate 
full compliance with the Animal Welfare Act prior to issuance of a license. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you once all sites have passed without any additional action on your part. If you have 
not received your license within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478.
